                                                throws SQLException
        Queries the database to retrieve a spectrum file belonging to a specific searchspectrum entry.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The corresponding spectrum file object.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • readSpectrumFromFile

        public MascotGenericFile readSpectrumFromFile(String pathname,
                                              long startPos,
                                              long endPos)
        Convenience method to read a spectrum from the MGF file in the specified path between the specified start and end byte positions.
        Parameters:
        pathname - The pathname string pointing to the desired file.
        startPos - The start byte position of the spectrum in the desired file.
        endPos - The end byte position of the spectrum in the desired file.
        Returns:
        the desired spectrum or null if no such spectrum could be found

      • packAndSend

        public List<String> packAndSend(long packageSize,
                                CheckBoxTreeTable checkBoxTree,
                                String filename)
                         throws IOException,
                                SQLException
        Method to consolidate spectra which are selected in a specified checkbox tree into spectrum packages of defined size.
        Parameters:
        packageSize - The amount of spectra per package.
        checkBoxTree - The checkbox tree.
        listener - An optional property change listener used to monitor progress.
        Returns:
        A list of files.
        Throws:
        IOException - if reading a spectrum file fails
        SQLException - if fetching spectrum data from the database fails

      • uploadFile

        public String uploadFile(String filename,
                         byte[] data)
        Uploads a file with the specified data contents to the server instance.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to upload
        data - The contents of the file to upload
        Returns:
        The path of the new file instance on the server

      • downloadSpectra

        public List<MascotGenericFile> downloadSpectra(long experimentID,
                                               SpectrumFetchParameters.AnnotationType annotType,
                                               boolean fromLibrary,
                                               boolean saveToFile)
                                        throws Exception
        Queries the database to retrieve a list of spectrum files belonging to a specified experiment.
        Parameters:
        experimentID - The primary key of the experiment.
        annotType - the annotation-related fetch setting, either one of AnnotationType.WITH_ANNOTATIONS, WITHOUT_ANNOTATIONS or IGNORE_ANNOTATIONS
        fromLibrary - true if the spectra shall be pulled from the spectral library, false when they shall be pulled from previous searches.
        saveToFile - true if the spectra are to be written to a file, false otherwise
        Returns:
        A list of spectrum files.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs

      • fetchAndExportSpectra

        public void fetchAndExportSpectra(String path,
                                  long expID,
                                  boolean ident,
                                  boolean uident,
                                  String filter)
                           throws SQLException
        fetch requested spectra from the database and write them to a file
        Parameters:
        path - path to the file that will be written
        expID - database ID of the experiment
        ident - TRUE if identified spectra should be fetched
        uident - TRUE if unidentified spectra should be fetched
        filter - will only fetch spectra that contain the specified string
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an error with a database fetch occurs

      • exportDatabaseSearchResult

        public void exportDatabaseSearchResult(String pathname)
        Copies the backup raw database search result dump to the specified file path, fetches the spectra referenced by the result object and stores them alongside the raw result.
        Parameters:
        pathname - the string representing the desired file path and name for the result object

        Returns:
        the restored result object or null if an error occurred

      • firePropertyChange

        public void firePropertyChange(String propertyName,
                               Object oldValue,
                               Object newValue)
        Forwards a bound property update to any registered listeners. No event is fired if old and new are equal and non-null.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - The programmatic name of the property that was changed.
        oldValue - The old value of the property.
        newValue - The new value of the property.
